mean_cn: adj. 经典的；古典的；  n. 经典著作
mean_en: a book, film/movie or song which is well known and considered to be of very high quality, setting standards for other books, etc.
sentence: "War and Peace" is regarded as a classic piece of literature.
sentence_trans: 《战争与和平》被认为是一部文学杰作。
word_etyma: class阶级 + ic表示人 → 高等阶级之人 → classic古典作家
